design_philosophy.name: ContentOS Dark
design_philosophy.description: A high-performance, dark-themed content generation dashboard focused on focus, clarity, and AI power. Turkish language first.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Dark Mode, High Contrast, Bento Grids, Neon Accents

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-all

cards.style: bg-card border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12

navigation.item_style: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-accent transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. LANGUAGE: The entire UI must be in TURKISH. Use 'Ba≈üla' for Start, 'Ayarlar' for Settings, etc.
2. THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to the root html element.
3. SIDEBAR: Create a persistent SidebarLayout component that wraps all pages.
4. MODULES: Each module (YouTube, X, etc.) must use its specific accent color for borders, active states, and icons.
5. PLACEHOLDERS: For placeholder pages (YouTube, Insta, etc.), create a 'ComingSoon' component that uses the module's accent color and a relevant 3D icon or abstract background.
6. X AI MODULE: This is the core feature. Implement the 4 tabs (Tweet, Quote, Reply, Article) as requested.
7. NO AUTH: Do not create login/signup pages. Direct user to Dashboard.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, tabs).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless specified (like Instagram).
Ensure all inputs have a focus ring matching the module's accent color.
Use 'Outfit' font for headings to give a premium feel.
